name: publishhtmlreport
description: This task can be used to publish html reports to azdo. Currently Jmeter HTML reports are being transformed to be consumed into Azdo directly
author: LII

inputs.name: htmlType
inputs.label: htmlType
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of HTML to be published. Current options are Jmeter for Jmeter report or genericHTML for any other HTML

inputs.name: htmlPath
inputs.label: htmlPath
inputs.helpMarkDown: Needed only when htmlType is genericHTML. Not needed for Jmeter report publishing

inputs.name: JmeterReportsPath
inputs.label: JmeterReportsPath
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where Jmeter report containing - content folder, index.html, statistics.json etc are present
